# Select <span class="text-size-0">`go-select`</span>

:::info

`go-select` and `go-combobox` components are heavily inspired by the amazing work by [smhigley](https://github.com/smhigley). Read the article [&lt;select&gt; your poison](https://www.24a11y.com/2019/select-your-poison/)

:::
